name: Why (etaZetaKaTheta)
description:
Hello, dear visitor!

This "game" is just some concepts that I managed to cramp together in 3 days.

Software used:

-Unity Personal 2021.2.13f1

-FL Studio (Most Xfer Tools like Serum, LFOTool...)

-GIMP

-Blender

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to Jump

W + A or D + Jump to ride a wall (only for certain walls)

Press E when crosshair on button to save checkpoint

There is no pause menu :)

Only 16:9 resolutions tested

Only Windows version for now :)
